sentences.en: a horrible dream
sentences.cn: 噩梦

sentences.en: a horrible smell
sentences.cn: 极难闻的气味

sentences.en: And now, like a thunderclap, had come this horrible news.
sentences.cn: 可现在, 晴天霹雳一样传来这样可怕的消息.

sentences.en: Don't be so horrible to me!
sentences.cn: 别对我如此不友好.

sentences.en: I have a horrible feeling that we’re going to miss the plane.
sentences.cn: 我有一种很不好的感觉，我们要赶不上飞机了。

sentences.en: I was repulsed by the horrible smell.
sentences.cn: 这种可怕的气味让我恶心。

sentences.en: Loneliness can be horrible, but it need not remain that way.
sentences.cn: 孤独可能会很可怕，但也并非一定如此。

sentences.en: That is a horrible accident.
sentences.cn: 那是一次可怕的事故.

sentences.en: That seems like a horrible mess that will drag on for years.
sentences.cn: 看起来那像是个会拖延多年的大烂摊子。

sentences.en: The coffee tasted horrible.
sentences.cn: 这种咖啡难喝极了。

sentences.en: The decision they made was horrible.
sentences.cn: 他们做出的决定令人感到恐怖.

sentences.en: The food looked horrible, but it tasted OK.
sentences.cn: 那食物看上去很糟，可吃起来还不错。

sentences.en: The thought of the horrible scene made my flesh creep.
sentences.cn: 想起那可怕的情景,我浑身都起鸡皮疙瘩.

sentences.en: The weather has been really horrible all week.
sentences.cn: 整个星期天气都很糟。

sentences.en: They made sure that he died a horrible death.
sentences.cn: 他们让他死得很惨。

sentences.en: This is such a flipping horrible picture.
sentences.cn: 这张照片真是难看得要死。

sentences.en: Ugh — it was horrible.
sentences.cn: 呃——真是可怕极了。

sentences.en: Unless you respect other people's religions, horrible mistakes and conflict will occur.
sentences.cn: 如果不尊重别人的宗教信仰，就会祷下大错，酿成冲突。

sentences.en: What a horrible thing to do.
sentences.cn: 做这样的事简直太可怕了！

sentences.en: What a horrible thing to say!
sentences.cn: 说起来这是多么可怕的事情啊!
